H0.text: Meaning 'quiet loud' what is the full modern Italian name for the piano. Pianoforte

H1.text: Meaning 'quiet loud' what is the full modern Italian name for the piano. Fortepiano

H2.text: Meaning 'quiet loud' what is the full modern Italian name for the piano. Clavicembalo

H3.text: Meaning 'quiet loud' what is the full modern Italian name for the piano. Piano

A4.text: The English word piano is a shortened form of the Italian pianoforte

A5.text: Fortepiano was the second keyboard instrument to allow gradations of volume and tone according to how forcefully or softly the player presses or strikes the keys
